promptVersions.body:
Salesforce is experiencing a service performance degradation. There can be slow load times, time-out errors, and network latency that affects the cloud infrastructure.

We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience!
promptVersions.description: SERVICE DISRUPTION BEGAN 10:15 am EDT, Jul 21 There’s a Salesforce service disruption. During a service disruption, end users can’t access the service.
promptVersions.title: *Salesforce Service Disruption*
